title: Starts of the Week + Week 3 Breakdown, Late Week Pickups - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/23
description:
Week 3 is here and The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason dive into Week 3 matchups and reveal their Starts of the Week! Plus, injury updates, and late week waiver adds during “Never Not Working!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 23rd, 2021.
  
 (04:45) - Never Not Working
 (11:20) - NFL News 
 (16:55) - Fantasy Forecast
 (17:30) - Washington Football Team at Bills
 (25:10) - Bears at Browns 
 (30:25) - Ravens at Lions 
 (37:10) - Colts at Titans 
 (42:20) - Chargers at Chiefs
 (48:50) - Saints at Patriots
 (52:45) - Starts of the Week
 (53:00) - QB Starts of the Week
 (56:15) - RB Starts of the Week
 (59:55) - WR Starts of the Week
 (01:03:50) - TE Starts of the Week
 (01:07:25) - Boom Boom Kicker of the Week
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
